answers.answer: I failed to mention that I don't have a history of diabetes or hypoglycemia

question: My blood sugar keeps dropping and although I feel like I'm eating all the right things for my first trimester my had pointed out I am 30 years old now not 24 (my last pregnancy) but I don't know if I should call the doctor or just try to eat more often (I already snack often due to nausea, fruits vegetables crackers :things like that. What do you think?
title: blood sugar
